## Description {#details}

Base class for errors originating when parsing raw PDB files.

## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a4a9a143295407ff8b787471f2481ebbf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code BinaryStreamError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamerror-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarystreamerror-h">BinaryStreamError.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamerror-cpp/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/binarystreamerror-cpp">BinaryStreamError.cpp</a>.
